alert.note: Alert for Cowlitz (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 7:52PM PST until January 08 at 6:01AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowlitz River at Kelso. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 21.5 feet, flooding of several low lying and secondary roads begins, including the Cowlitz Gardens neighborhood, along with flooding of pasture and lowland upstream of Kelso. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM PST Friday the stage was 21.9 feet. - The river crested near 24.0 feet late Thursday into early Friday. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and should continue to subside through the weekend. - Minor flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued early Saturday morning.
